course_description: An inquiry into fundamental questions in epistemology and metaphysics, with special attention to how problems in one area impacts problems in the other. The course will include texts from various historical periods, providing students with some sense of philosophical questions evolve over time.Philosophy course.
sections: Class Nbr: 1739, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
